Description:
You see a woman concentrated on a cauldron. Around her you can also see many strange gadgets, colorful potions and animal bones, she sees you and says:

"I am Malukah, the shop owner. At the moment I am very busy finishing a very complex potion, but I really am missing the last and most important ingredient ...

Do you happen to have something that belonged to a powerful demon? ... well, I guess not."
DescriptionAction: Since you are here, take a look at her wares.

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "Bernard and Malukah speak for a while and share their extensive alchemical knowledge with each other. \r\n\nThe conversation is pleasant, and although Malukah doesn’t know where to find the Philosopher's Stone that Bernard is looking for, she teaches him a spell that may help him on his quest, as well as offers a 30% discount at her shop. \r\n\nWhile they are speaking, the rest of you look around to see if there are any potions that interest you.",
